name: 3D Multiplayer Car Racing Game
short_description: This is simple 3D multiplayer car racing game that i wrote for one of my assignments for distributed systems subject at University of Melbourne which was the best distributed systems project in second semester of 2008.(Java, JOGL, TCP Socket)
